• Creates Matrix-style falling character animation using HTML Canvas
  • Supports extensive customization via URL parameters for text, colors, and motion
  • Implements performance optimization with visibility-aware rendering
ctx.fillText(char, drop.x, drop Narcissus.y); document.hidden ? stopDrawing() : startDrawing();

This canvas-based application renders customizable Matrix-inspired character rain effects. Users can modify visual parameters through URL query options like text, speed, and color schemes. The animation pause Menus when tab visibility changes to conserve system resources.
